xsl:element.name: setting
xsl:element.xsl:text: Where and when does the scene take place: Interior or Exterior? location? time of day (day or night)? Paint a picture of the surroundings, the ambiance, any relevant objects or features and initial states of characters.

xsl:element.name: introduction
xsl:element.xsl:text: Write the words a narrator would use to introduce this scene

xsl:element.name: illustration
xsl:element.xsl:text: Pick an important character or an important object from this scene and vividly describe it to be illustrated. Pick someone or something you have not yet picked before. Make your description simple and self-contained because our illustrator will only see your description and nothing else. The names of characters etc. will not mean anything to them and our illustrator gets confused if you mention more than one thing so describe just one character or object and do not mention anything else.

xsl:element.name: illustration_title
xsl:element.xsl:text: Pick a short funny title to accompany the illustration you described above.

xsl:element.name: sound
xsl:element.xsl:text: Vividly describe one single simple sound suitable to introduce this scene that matches the mood, location and gives context. Make your description self-contained because our sound effects team will only see your description and nothing else.

xsl:element.name: music
xsl:element.xsl:text: Vividly describe music that matches this scene's mood, location and gives context. Make the description self-contained because our musician will only see your description and nothing else.

xsl:element.name: abc_music
xsl:element.xsl:text: Compose a suitable music tune for this scene using ABC music notation.

xsl:element.name: protagonist_reaction
xsl:element.xsl:text: Briefly propose a single different way the protagonist can react to the situation in this scene. If asked to propose more than one reaction make all reactions as different as possible from each other and make sure some are bad and some are good. Do not mention reactions are choices or options.
